subject: AI & Agents
title: What Is Creativity, Really?
description: A micro-lesson that makes What Is Creativity, Really? usable.

hook.text: We say a painting is creative but not a sunset. What separates creation from coincidence?

buildup.text: Psychologists define creativity as producing something novel, useful, and surprising.

discovery.text: Margaret Boden identified three types: combinational, exploratory, and transformational creativity.

twist.text: By these definitions, AI already achieves combinational and exploratory creativity.

climax.text: The debate isn't whether AI outputs are creative â€” it's whether the process counts.

punchline.text: Creativity might be in the output, not the creator.

quiz.question: What are the three types of creativity identified by Margaret Boden?
